extendedInfo.description: Competition continues to pass through the mode of memory. Adding a new element of the brain age test. Each game has six letter lights, began to challenge the order in accordance with certain flashes after, you need to press them again after all the letter lights. Flashing them a perfect repeat sequence. And let your brain come alive again now!

reviews.comment: Kinda hard goes to fast to actually remember what\'s going on level 8 first try oh btw FIRST COMMENT
reviews.author: A Google User
